title: pyKeylogger
description:
PyKeylogger No Nag Screen


pyKeylogger is an open source keylogger. However, the official download has a nag screen + 4 Day Expiration that makes it unusable. I removed the nag screen from the code and recompiled it. It is the latest version 1.2.1.


Features:
- records all keystrokes
- takes timed screenshots (optional)
- takes screenshots at mouse click (optional)
- send zipped or plain text logs and screenshots via ftp or email 

Website URL: http://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/pykeylogger/index.php?title=Main_Page

Setup:
UnRar pyKeylogger-no-nag.zip to the location of your choosing

Usage:
To start the keylogger,simply click pyKeylogger.exe from the unRared folder.

The default keys to open the pyKeylogger control panel are 
Left Ctrl + Right Ctrl + F12
(If your laptop is using a media BIOS for the F keys,use Fn + F12 for F12)

The Defualt password is Blank,so simply press Enter when confronted with the Password screen.

Enjoy!
